item.title: 学校膳食如何促进全球农业改革
item.description: 至关重要的学校供餐计划为全球约 4.18 亿儿童提供了食物，并创造了约 400 万个直接就业机会。同时，这些项目也需要大量的粮食和农作物来喂饱不断长大的胃。【原文：Crucial school-meal programs feed some 418 million children and have created about 4 million direct jobs around the world. They also require huge amounts of food and crops to feed growing stomachs.】

item.title: 根据欧盟数字规则，苹果和 Meta 将被罚款
item.description: 苹果公司和 Meta Platforms 公司将在下周末被处以欧盟《大科技竞争规则》规定的罚款，其中 iPhone 制造商还将面临欧盟《数字市场法》规定的经常性处罚威胁。【原文：Apple Inc. and Meta Platforms Inc. are set be hit by fines under the European Union’s Big Tech competition rulebook toward the end of next week, with the iPhone maker facing the added threat of recurring penalties under the bloc’s Digital Markets Act.】

item.title: 日经新闻》称软银可能为美国的人工智能事业认捐 1 万亿美元
item.description: 据《日经新闻》报道，软银集团公司计划在全美创建人工智能产业园，并考虑投资超过1万亿美元。【原文：SoftBank Group Corp. plans to create industrial parks for artificial intelligence across the US and is considering an investment of more than $1 trillion, Nikkei reported.】

item.title: Reddit 暴跌 50%，增长放缓未能吸引 "逢低买入 "者
item.description: Reddit 公司的股价从 2 月份的高点下跌了 50%，在动荡的科技股压力下，围绕该公司的阴郁情绪未能消散。【原文：The gloomy sentiment around Reddit Inc. has failed to dissipate after its shares fell 50% from a February high, with volatile technology stocks under pressure.】

item.title: 特朗普加征关税前，石油有望实现第三周上涨
item.description: 在市场为特朗普政府征收更多关税做好准备之际，石油价格迎来了第三次周线上涨。【原文：Oil headed for a third weekly advance as the market braces for more tariffs from the Trump administration.】

item.title: Blackstone 收购基金关闭时间较晚，低于早期目标
item.description: Blackstone Inc. 为其旗舰收购基金募集现金的旷日持久的活动终于接近尾声，超出了原定计划，比最初的预期少了数十亿美元。【原文：Blackstone Inc.’s protracted campaign to raise cash for its flagship buyout fund is finally grinding to a close, beyond schedule and billions of dollars short of initial expectations.】

item.title: 拓普康获得 24 亿美元管理层收购要约，KKR 提供支持
item.description: 在 KKR & Co. 和日本投资公司（Japan Investment Corp.）【原文：Topcon Corp.’s chief executive officer is leading a management buyout, backed by KKR & Co. and a unit of Japan Investment Corp., that values the Japanese optical and medical equipment maker at about ¥358 billion ($2.4 billion).】

item.title: 一些欧洲国家推动制定更灵活的 2025 年天然气储存目标
item.description: 一些欧盟国家仍在推动从今年开始实施更加灵活的天然气储存目标，因为该集团正在谈判一个新的框架，以补充其枯竭的储备。【原文：Some European Union nations are still pushing for more flexible gas storage targets to start this year, as the bloc negotiates a new framework for refilling its depleted reserves.】

item.title: 英伟达™（Nvidia®）公司总裁黄仁勋为量子行业领导者提供实用建议
item.description: 欢迎收看 Tech In Depth，我们的每日时事通讯提供彭博社全球记者对科技商业的报道和分析。今天，伊恩-金（Ian King）将报道黄仁勋（Jensen Huang）对量子产业如何成为一个可行企业的建议。【原文：Welcome to Tech In Depth, our daily newsletter with reporting and analysis about the business of tech from Bloomberg’s journalists around the world. Today, Ian King reports on Jensen Huang’s advice to the quantum industry about how to become a viable business.】

item.title: 媒体称长江和记将推迟签署巴拿马港口协议
item.description: 据媒体报道，香港最著名的亿万富翁李嘉诚下周将不会继续签署一项有争议的协议，将其巴拿马运河港口出售给包括贝莱德公司（BlackRock Inc.【原文：Billionaire Li Ka-shing, Hong Kong’s most famous tycoon, won’t go ahead with the expected signing next week of a controversial deal to sell his Panama Canal ports to a consortium including BlackRock Inc., according to media reports.】

item.title: 美联储官员在关税影响问题上意见不一，令债券价格前景蒙上阴影
item.description: 市场数据截至美国东部时间上午 06:43。根据供应商协议，市场数据可能会有所延迟。【原文：Market data as of 06:43 am EST. Market data may be delayed depending on provider agreements.】

item.title: 印度法院裁定谷歌计费政策为反竞争政策
item.description: 周五，一家上诉法院与印度反垄断监管机构达成一致，认为谷歌应用商店的计费政策对开发者不公平且具有限制性，这对 Alphabet 公司来说是一个挫折。【原文：An appeals court Friday agreed with India’s antitrust regulator that Google’s app store billing policy was unfair and restrictive for developers, in a setback for the Alphabet Inc. company.】

item.title: 皮克泰削减土耳其公司债券的超配权重
item.description: 鉴于土耳其近期的政治动荡，欧洲领先的资产管理公司 Pictet Asset Management SA 正在削减其对土耳其公司债券的增持评级。【原文：Pictet Asset Management SA, a leading European-based asset manager, is cutting its overweight stance on Turkish corporate bonds given the country’s recent political unrest.】

item.title: 特朗普削减国税局经费诱使纳税人作弊
item.description:
随着国家税务总局（DOGE）对税务机构的大幅削减，可能会有更多的美国人胆大妄为，逃避纳税。【原文：

With DOGE cutting deep at the tax agency, more Americans might feel emboldened to dodge payments.

】

item.title: 石油公司欠账累累，墨西哥石油公司工人配给玉米饼。
item.description:
墨西哥国营石油公司拖欠供应商数百万美元，一个沿海城市正在为此付出代价。【原文：

La petrolera estatal de México debe millones a sus proveedores, y una ciudad costera está pagando las consecuencias.

】

item.title: 特朗普的关税威胁冻结了中国在墨西哥的投资
item.description: 比亚迪是中国最大的汽车制造商，去年曾一度准备在墨西哥建造第一家工厂，但唐纳德-特朗普重返白宫后，比亚迪的计划却被搁浅了。【原文：BYD, China’s largest automaker, looked all set last year to build its first factory in Mexico, but then Donald Trump returned to the White House.】

item.title: 顺丰控股扩大航空货运业务以应对激烈竞争
item.description: 顺丰控股有限公司今年的目标是通过扩大空运业务来巩固其限时快递业务，以应对快递业日益加剧的竞争。【原文：SF Holding Co. aims to solidify its time-definite express business by expanding airfreight operations this year to meet intensifying competition in the courier industry.】

item.title: 被特朗普盯上的南非寻求重启贸易关系
item.description: 自唐纳德-特朗普重返白宫以来，美国一直在攻击南非，南非正在努力重塑与美国的关系。【原文：South Africa is working to reset US relations that have been under assault by Donald Trump since his return to the White House.】

item.title: AT1 需求强劲，跳票风险上升
item.description: 最近，对风险最高的银行债务的需求非常强劲，以至于发行商能够以优惠条件出售这些证券。德意志银行（Deutsche Bank AG）刚刚提醒投资者注意由此带来的额外风险。【原文：Demand for the riskiest type of bank debt has been so strong lately that issuers have been able to sell the securities on favorable terms. Deutsche Bank AG just reminded investors of the added risk that creates.】

item.title: 价值股涨势需要新催化剂，盈利是一张王牌
item.description: 面对今年的股市大跌，价值型股票迎来了难得的好时机。即将到来的财报季将有助于确定价值型股票在与市场高价股的竞争中是否能持续保持优异表现。【原文：Value stocks are having a rare moment in the face of this year’s equity selloff. The upcoming earnings season will help determine whether the group’s outperformance against the market’s high-flyers can persist.】

item.title: 全球债券反弹，通胀数据成为焦点
item.description: 由于欧洲消费者物价数据低于预期，且投资者在等待美联储青睐的通胀指标数据，全球债券反弹。【原文：Global bonds rallied as European consumer price data came in softer than expected and investors awaited data on the Federal Reserve’s favored inflation gauge.】

item.title: 土耳其市场月度大幅下跌后寻求新平衡
item.description: 土耳其总统雷杰普-塔伊普-埃尔多安（Recep Tayyip Erdogan）的最大竞争对手被拘押，引发了上周的暴跌，市场正努力寻找新的平衡点，土耳其里拉和债券将创下 2023 年以来最严重的月度跌幅。【原文：The Turkish lira and bonds are headed for their worst monthly declines since 2023 as markets seek to find new equilibrium levels in the wake of last week’s rout, sparked by the detention of President Recep Tayyip Erdogan’s biggest rival.】

item.title: 人工智能热潮中的新亿万富翁
item.description:
人工智能的热潮为29位创始人创造了总价值710亿美元的财富。【原文：

The rush into artificial intelligence has minted fortunes worth a collective $71 billion for 29 founders.

】

item.title: 巴西中央银行缩水引发监管担忧
item.description: 五年多前，巴西中央银行的工作人员在疫情肆虐时全力以赴，建立了一个数字支付系统，让他们的同胞可以免费、即时地转账。【原文：Little more than five years ago, staff at Brazil’s central bank pulled out all the stops in the midst of the pandemic to construct a digital-payments system that would give their compatriots access to free and instant money transfers.】

item.title: 减值减少，中国大型银行实现利润增长
item.description: 由于信贷减值的下降抵消了利润率的收窄，中国最大的银行去年实现了利润增长。【原文：China’s biggest banks delivered profit gains last year as sliding credit impairments offset narrowing margins.】

item.title: 印度银行成为开拓日元贷款市场的最新印度借款人
item.description: 贷款人计划在下个月将印度银行的一笔日元贷款推向更广泛的银团市场，这是印度借款人以日币进行的最新一笔交易。【原文：Lenders plan to bring a yen-denominated loan taken out by Bank of India to the broader syndication market next month, the latest deal by an Indian borrower in the Japanese currency.】

item.title: 由于家庭关闭暖气，欧洲天然气将出现每周亏损
item.description: 随着供暖季接近尾声，欧洲天然气价格将出现三周以来的首次下跌，人们的注意力已完全转移到为明年冬季重新储备天然气上。【原文：European natural gas prices are set for the first weekly loss in three as the heating season draws to an end and attention fully shifts to restocking for next winter.】

item.title: 据说阿布扎比第二大银行考虑出售不良贷款
item.description: 阿布扎比商业银行（Abu Dhabi Commercial Bank PJSC）熟悉内情的人士称，随着中东地区的贷款机构希望进一步清理其资产负债表，该银行正在考虑有可能出售更多的坏账。【原文：Abu Dhabi Commercial Bank PJSC is considering potentially offloading more bad debt, people familiar with the matter said, as Middle East lenders look to further clean up their balance sheets.】

item.title: 中国电动汽车在欧洲的市场份额降至两年来最低点
item.description: 中国汽车制造商错过了欧洲上月电动汽车需求反弹的机会，因为大众汽车公司等老牌制造商占据了销量增长的最大部分。【原文：Chinese automakers missed out on a European rebound in EV demand last month, as more-established manufacturers like Volkswagen AG captured the biggest part of a jump in sales.】
